entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 11:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
